description:
How Python can be used to create and educate

| How I went from knowing nothing about computer programming, to
  creating maker projects and a raising an income using Python as my
  main language.
| Learn what worked well for me, and the failures along the way so YOU
  can take that first step to becoming a maker with Python.
| I will also talk about outreach in schools and clubs that is much
  needed for the next generation of Pythonistas.
title: From Faker to Maker
